query:
UPDATE recipes SET
                name = $1,
                notes = $2,
                preparation_time_min = $3,
                cooking_time_min = $4,
                image = $5,
                instructions = $6,
                n_shares = $7,
                shares_unit = $8,
                is_private = $9,
                update_date = CURRENT_DATE
            WHERE id = $10
